Entry.JapaneseText: バルカ港
Entry.EnglishText: Balka Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカ港
Entry.EnglishText: Balka Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマルから来たんだけどね お披露目の儀式のついでに、 おいしい魚が食べたいと思ってね。
Entry.EnglishText: I came all the way from Anikamal for the unveiling ceremony. Figured I might as well try the fish while I'm here.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、最近は不漁だって 言われてさ……仕方ないから 干物をおみやげに買ったわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: But they said the fish haven't been biting lately...so I ended up getting some dried fish as a souvenir.

Entry.JapaneseText: いやぁ、バルカはさすが都だね。 うちの地元じゃ売ってない物が たくさんある。
Entry.EnglishText: Wow, Balka's definitely the capital. I've never even heard of some of the stuff they're selling here.

Entry.JapaneseText: それに、にぎわってる。 お披露目に合わせて 旅行に来てよかったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: And it's so busy, to boot. Glad I scheduled my trip to coincide with the unveiling.

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ様は、 絶世の美女だって 言われてるんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard people say that Agarte is the most beautiful woman in the world...

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ見た事がないんだよ。 想像してるんだけど、 想像だにできないんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I haven't seen her yet, but I've been trying to picture what she might look like. I can't even imagine...

Entry.JapaneseText: いやあ、お披露目の儀式、 楽しみだよねぇ。
Entry.EnglishText: Y'know, I'm really looking forward to the unveiling ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は当日の衣装が 特に楽しみなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I especially can't wait to see all the costumes.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式はカレギア城にて、 <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>に行われる。
Entry.EnglishText: The unveiling ceremony will be held at Calegia Castle on the <Blue>Day of Goldova<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 全軍あげての警備体制が 敷かれている。 行動には注意するように。
Entry.EnglishText: The entire army is working security. Be careful not to get into trouble.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミャーオーン♪
Entry.EnglishText: Meeeoooow ♪
Entry.Notes: Music note doesn't show up in simple preview

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: いやあ、よく来てくれたね。 こんな時に……！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, it's nice of you to finally show up. And at a time like this...!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうも、いらっしゃい。
Entry.EnglishText: Hello, welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい！ イイモノそろえてますよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome, welcome! We've got some great stuff in!

Entry.JapaneseText: い、いらっしゃい…… 私はガジュマですけど、 意地悪しないでくださいよ……
Entry.EnglishText: W-Welcome... I know I'm a Gajuma, but please don't be rude...

Entry.JapaneseText: 王都の外門、バルカ港！ バルカまでの道のりは まだまだあるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Balka Harbor, the outer gate of the Royal Capital! We've still got a long way to go to reach Balka proper.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: 準備は万端かな？
Entry.EnglishText: Will this be all?

Entry.JapaneseText: またどうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again.

Entry.JapaneseText: このあいだ、 港に着いた軍の船が、 いっぱい兵士を乗せて出てったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The other day, a ship arrived at the harbor and then left full to the brim with soldiers.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールに行くって言ってたけど、 また争いかねえ……嫌だねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: He said he was going to Minal, but another fight might break out... I hate this...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ちょっとだけ世の中も 落ち着いて来たみたいだね…… 安心したよ……
Entry.EnglishText: The world finally seems to have calmed down a bit as of late... What a relief...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか世の中大変な事に なってるよね…… お客さんが来ると安心するよ！
Entry.EnglishText: There's a lot of trouble brewing around the world, right...? Seeing customers gives me peace of mind!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか妙な空だけど、 不思議と不安はないんだよね……
Entry.EnglishText: The sky looks kind of wrong, but oddly enough, I'm not worried...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ヒューマのお客さんは 妙に意地悪でね…… 時々、裏で泣いてますよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Lately, Huma customers have been weirdly mean... I've been sneaking out back to cry...

Entry.JapaneseText: わ、私は別に……ヒューマにも、 悪い感情は持ってないんですよ…… でも、<Yellow>ヒト<White>の関係っていうのは 相手がある事ですからねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: I-It's not like I hate the Huma or something... I just think a <Yellow>human <White>relationship should be between equals...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここバルカ港は都の玄関口だから、 色んな街の人々が集まって来るんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Because Balka Harbor is the gateway to the capital, people travel here from all over the world.

Entry.JapaneseText: 色んな職業の人もね。 変な人もいるけれど、 お互い共存し合ってるんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: People can come from many walks of life. Even if they're strange, we all coexist together.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海の向こうでも こっちでも小競り合い…… ケンカする奴はどっか行っちゃえ！ って感じだね。
Entry.EnglishText: There's skirmishes breaking out everywhere now... Everyone who's fighting should just go away already! That's how I feel.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールみたいに、 街ごとケンカしてる連中は 街ごとなくなっちゃえばいいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Like the people fighting in Minal. They're causing so much pain, I wish their whole city would just vanish.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレって過激すぎ……？ ま、それよりも……
Entry.EnglishText: You think I'm too radical...? Well, you just don't understand yet...
Entry.Notes: that linebreak suckkkk but i can't do better - pegi

Entry.JapaneseText: いい魚がとれたよ！ 舟盛りにしたんだけど、 ちょっと味見してくかい？
Entry.EnglishText: I caught some high-quality fish and ended up making boat-wrap sushi. Want a little taste?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>食べますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Take a bite? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『<item:20000012>』を食べました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Ate "<item:20000012>."

Entry.JapaneseText: うまい……
Entry.EnglishText: It's good...

Entry.JapaneseText: おいしい!! おいしいヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: This is so good!! It's so dang tasty!!

Entry.JapaneseText: これは……感動的なうまさだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's...an impressive amount of skill here.

Entry.JapaneseText: おいしい……
Entry.EnglishText: Delicious...

Entry.JapaneseText: う、うますぎる……！ この魚……五つ星だ！
いい味出してるわね……
Entry.EnglishText: It's actually pretty good...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>『<item:20000012>』のレシピを入手しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>Obtained recipe for "<item:20000012>"!

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: 魚は鮮度が大切なんだぜ！ 食べたくなったら、 早いとこ来いよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Freshness is vital when it comes to fish! If you want to eat, come by early!

Entry.JapaneseText: また、イキのいい魚が とれないかなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm, I wonder if I'll be able to get more fresh fish...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、不漁でね、イイ魚がとれれば、 おいしい魚料理を食わしてやる事も できるんだが……
Entry.EnglishText: The fish haven't been biting lately, but if I manage to catch more I'll be able to cook them up for everyone...

Entry.JapaneseText: また、そのうち来てくれよ。 きっとイイ魚が入るから。 絶対、見逃すなよ、な！
Entry.EnglishText: Come back soon! Next time, I'll be sure to have fish in again! Make sure you don't miss it!
